column1: SPATIALFLOW SPATIAL LAYOUT INPUT — Renovation Plan (68'-2" × 43'-0")
⚠ RENOVATION CONSTRAINT: Existing porch (East), fire-escape stairs (SE), concrete stair (E), steel guard — ALL MUST REMAIN. Route all materials to avoid these zones.

column10: Spatial Priority Note
ALL rooms accessed. Building empty. No storage conflict.
Engineer must access all 3 parking levels + dining beam
East porch + fire escape stairs: NO access. Hoarding marks exclusion zone
Debris route: kitchen → north corridor → North dumpster. Keep East clear
Scaffold N facade. Brick must match – store samples on site
STOP WORK ZONE during abatement. Full site access halted in affected area
Temp shoring BEFORE beam removal. Props remain until Parallam installed
Small area. Existing foundation stays. Protect adjacent fire-escape stair
Long beam – needs clear North access. Temp shores stay until beam seated+connected
Crane North-West. Must not swing over East exclusion zone
Steel post heavy. Base plate: 4×4×½". Crane reach to West levels
Joists long – West staging must be clear 20ft. Crane active all week
Heaviest material. Forklift accesses West side only. No East access this week
Small material. Store inside. Bolt pattern per plan – staggered 2 rows
Fire-rated assembly – materials must be certified. Inspect before close-up
Brick colour/texture match critical. Order samples week 1. Stage North only
Windows fragile. Deliver just-in-time. North facade access only
ONLY concrete work near East exclusion zone. Protect existing porch structure
Build on existing foundation. Fire-escape stair adjacent – do NOT disturb
Maintain 1% slope to front. Gas-proof ceiling must remain intact above
Gas-proof rating must be maintained. Inspector sign-off before next phase
3'-6" high guard. Install after beam and post confirmed plumb and level
W/D hookup adjacent bathroom. Coordinate drain with existing slab penetrations
Panel upgrade likely. Coordinate with fire-rated ceiling zones in parking/garage
C1 type ceiling insulation. Do not substitute. Inspector to verify
Type X for garage + parking fire-rated areas. Standard elsewhere
STC 50 + 45min fire. Use specified assembly – no substitution
W/D connection: verify rough-in clearances before delivery
Flammable – ventilated storage. No energising in storage room
Inspector verifies: 1½ hr ceiling, gas-proof garage, STC 50 kitchen floor
All systems commissioned. Engineer + inspector sign-off required
